title: X & O
description: A JavaScript Tic Tac Toe game is a web-based game where two players take turns marking a 3x3 grid with X and O symbols.

title: Flappy Bird
description: A JavaScript todo app allows users to create and manage their to-do list. The app is built using JavaScript / React.

title: Meme Generator
description: A meme generator project in JavaScript is a fun for users to generate and customize their own memes.

aboutMe:
Hello! I'm Jack, an aspiring front end developer with a passion for creating beautiful, user-friendly web experiences. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I am eager to learn and grow as a developer while staying up to date with the latest front end technologies and best practices.
I am highly motivated, detail-oriented, and committed to delivering high-quality work that meets the needs of clients.
